name: Gantika
content: Gantika was a Togruta female who served as the elder of a village on the planet Shili during the Republic Era. When Pav-ti and Nak-il's daughter Ahsoka Tano was born, Gantika was summoned to the scene in order to be informed of the child's name. A year later, when Pav-ti took Tano on a hunting rite of passage, Gantika marked the mother and daughter's brows with blue paint as a sign of good luck. Tano was abducted by a sabertooth during the hunting trip, and when she miraculously returned to the village riding the creature, which left voluntarily, Gantika identified her as a Force-sensitive.
